arguments.description: The x coord of circle center.
arguments.name: x

arguments.description: The y coord of circle center.
arguments.name: y

arguments.description: (false/nil) The circle will be filled, (true) The circle will have only lines (outline).
arguments.name: l

arguments.description: The color of the circle (0-15), defaults to the active color.
arguments.name: c

arguments.description: The number of the segments used when drawing the circle.
arguments.name: seg

note: The arguments can be passed in a table.
shortDescription: Draws a circle on the screen.
